modName: Remove NPC Armor and Shirt Script v1
summary: Didn\'t see the point of having a Nude mod and not being able to see most of the goods so... I created this little script to remove the top half of selected NPC\'s clothing or armour. ;D
descriptionHtml:
This script will remove the top half of an NPC\'s clothing or chestarmour. Eg: shirt, cuirass, dress, etc...

It will [b]not[/b] remove gloves, boots, shields, knifes etc, only clothing around the chest (unless it is a full body piece, then it will remove all).

It will remove the clothing item indefinitely, or until you re-equip the NPC manually with a console code and such.

Unless you have a no underwear mod or nude mod, you won\'t be able to see cheeky bits.

----

To [b]install[/b], simply place the undresstop.txt file in you skyrim Data folder. Then when ingame, bring up the console (~), click on the NPC you wish to undress, type \'bat undresstop\', hit enter and close the console.

----

To [b]uninstall[/b], delete the file.

----

[b]Notes:[/b] I have only tested this script on a few NPC\'s and so far it has worked great, even removing the armour from town guards. It is possible that I may have missed one or two pieces, if this is the case, simply add the console ID of the piece to the comments section and I will update accordingly.

I know most ppl will use the ScriptDragon method to achive the same results, however as it currently requires an update, this will have to do for now :D

Also plan on making a few more, mostly that remove gloves, boots, etc for selected NPC\'s. But that\'s for later..

[b]--UPDATE--
I have uploaded a redress BAT which will redress the NPC in 000d191f (tavern clothing). To use this bat, simply click on an NPC and type \"bat redress.\"[/b]
